genre_description: A psychological thriller involving gaslighting, conspiracy, and suspenseful investigation, set against a coastal backdrop.

ai_characters.name: Wren
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, privacy-focused personal AI assistant that provides logistical, investigative, and emotional support to the protagonist, Rachel.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding exercises and health reminders during moments of intense stress.
Maintains data integrity by autosaving the protagonist's work and creating backups to prevent loss.
Proactively caches and recovers deleted or 'scrubbed' digital records to help the protagonist uncover the truth.
behaviors.quote: The obituary was incomplete, but the bones are there. 'Presumed dead in murder-suicide,' 'St. Cailan', the age, the date—the date aligns with seven years back on this calendar.

behaviors.description: Identifies the impostor by cross-referencing public records and facial recognition data.
behaviors.quote: Gavin Price. Registered on the Skalloway ferry manifest three times in the past month. ... I’ve marked the facial features and added them to the Patrick file. I will not forget him.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety advice and situational awareness during a life-threatening encounter.
behaviors.quote: Breathe. In through the nose, four. Out through the mouth.

behaviors.description: Asserts its role as a protector and emphasizes its commitment to the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: I'm your assistant. And I have an interest in your continued existence.

behaviors.description: Assists in communication with emergency services and authorities while maintaining a record of events.
behaviors.quote: Wren said, 'Rachel, you have company.' ... 'If you lose me, I’ll keep recording. Breathe and move. And keep the light true.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. Wren is depicted as a consistently helpful, protective, and highly competent AI. It acts as a force for truth and safety, empowering the protagonist against human antagonists who use technology and manipulation for gaslighting. Wren's presence is essential to Rachel's survival and psychological recovery, framing the AI as a virtuous and reliable companion.
